Variable Name: The variable that you would like to represent in your ontology schema.
Belongs to Ontology: If the variable exists in an ontology below, select the ontology from the dropdown menu. Otherwise, please leave blank.
Parent Variable: Please type the variable from the Parent Ontology that you would like to connect your variable to. If the variable is already in a selected ontology, please leave blank.
Definition of Variable: Please provide the definition the variable. For reccomendation on a definition, search the term in https://schema.org. If the variable is already in a selected ontology, please leave blank.
Alternative Name(s):
Please provide any alternative names for the variable in the literature. If the variable is already in a selected ontology, please leave blank
*Optional*
Unit:
Please provide the unit that the variable is expressed in your data. For a dictionary of standardized units, please visit https://qudt.org. If the variable is already in a selected ontology, please leave blank
*Optional*
Logical Axioms:
Please provide any logic you would like to attach to your variable. For information and examples on logical axioms, please visit https://www.w3.org/TR/daml+oil-axioms/ If the variable is already in a selected ontology, please leave blank.
*Optional*
